textBeforeTable: Offensive Fouls Home | Teams/Players | Commentary | Services | Contact Us Random Stat: Turnover Type Leaders Q: Do you have the statistics for palming/carry violations called on players this season by any chance? -- John P. A: Indeed we do, although not by chance! Let's take an in-season look at several of the more common turnover types...
textAfterTable: Mr. Curry has a sizeable lead this season, not a shock given he was last year's "winner" in this category. While the top ten is primarily the lovable lugs in the post types who muscle their smaller defenders out of the way with a little too much vigor on occasion, there are a sprinkling of the fearless drivers as well, aka Arenas, Gordon, Ellis.
